00031 class CalvinEquivalent
00032 {
00033 
00034 public:
00035   int numPassed, numFailed;
00036   CalvinEquivalent()
00037   {
00038     numPassed = 0;
00039     numFailed = 0;
00040   }
00041   void testDifferences();
00042   void testDifferencesNegative();
00043   void testDifferencesCorrelation();
00044   void testDifferencesFractional();

00058 void CalvinEquivalent::testDifferences()
00059 {
00060   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent -e 0.005 -c 1.0 -k 0 ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff2_small.chp";
00061   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00062   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testDifferences", command, checks);
00063   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testDifferences()");
00064   if (differencesTest.run())
00065     ++numPassed;
00066   else
00067   {
00068     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testDifferences(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00069     ++numFailed;
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void CalvinEquivalent::testDifferencesNegative()
00074 {
00075   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent -e 0.0001 -c 1.0 -k 0 ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff2_small.chp";
00076   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00077   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testDifferencesNegative", command, checks);
00078   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testDifferencesNegative()");
00079   if (!differencesTest.run())
00080   {
00081     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00082     ++numPassed;
00083   } else {
00084     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00085     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testDifferencesNegative(): Negative Test SHOULD HAVE FAILED!!!");
00086     ++numFailed;
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CalvinEquivalent::testDifferencesCorrelation()
00091 {
00092   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent --epsilon 0.0001 --correlation 0.98 --check-header false ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff2_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_small.chp";
00093   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00094   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testDifferencesCorrelation", command, checks);
00095   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testDifferencesCorrelation()");
00096   if (differencesTest.run())
00097     ++numPassed;
00098   else
00099   {
00100     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testDifferencesCorrelation(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00101     ++numFailed;
00102   }
00103 }

00108   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;

00112     ++numPassed;
00113   else

00117   }

00248 // file NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp has NaN values, verify passes if NaN status is same by comparing file to itself
00249 void CalvinEquivalent::testNaNNumDiffPositive()
00250 {
00251   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent -n true -e 0.005 -c 1.0 -k 0 ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp";
00252   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00253   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testNaNNumDiffPositive", command, checks);
00254   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testNaNNumDiffPositive()");
00255   if (differencesTest.run())
00256     ++numPassed;
00257   else
00258   {
00259     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testNaNNumDiffPositive(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00260     ++numFailed;
00261   }
00262 }
00263 
00264 // file NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp has NaN values, verify fails if NaN status is different by comparing file without NaN values
00265 void CalvinEquivalent::testNaNNumDiffNegative()
00266 {
00267   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent --report-nan-num-diff true -e 0.005 -c 1.0 -k 0 ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_small.chp";
00268   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00269   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testNaNNumDiffNegative", command, checks);
00270   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testNaNNumDiffNegative()");
00271   if (!differencesTest.run())
00272   {
00273     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00274     ++numPassed;
00275   } else {
00276     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00277     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testNaNNumDiffNegative(): Negative Test SHOULD HAVE FAILED!!");
00278     ++numFailed;
00279   }
00280 }
00281 
00282 // file NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp has NaN values, verify that NaN differences are ignored if -n option is false
00283 void CalvinEquivalent::testIgnoreNaNNumDifferences()
00284 {
00285   string command = "./apt-calvin-equivalent -n false -e 0.005 -c 1.0 -k 0 ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_NaN_small.chp ./data/NA06985_GW6_C.birdseed-v2_ValueDiff1_small.chp";
00286   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00287   RegressionTest differencesTest ("testIgnoreNaNNumDifferences", command, checks);
00288   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing testIgnoreNaNNumDifferences()");
00289   if (differencesTest.run())
00290     ++numPassed;
00291   else
00292   {
00293     Verbose::out (1, "Error in CalvinEquivalent::testIgnoreNaNNumDifferences(): " + differencesTest.getErrorMsg());
00294     ++numFailed;
00295   }
00296 }
00297 
00298 int main (int argc, char* argv[])
00299 {
00300   try {
00301     CalvinEquivalent test;
00302     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00303     test.testDifferences();
00304     test.testDifferencesNegative();
00305     test.testDifferencesCorrelation();
00306     test.testDifferencesFractional();
00307     test.testDifferencesFractionalNegative();
00308     test.testDiffHeaderIgnore();
00309     test.testDiffHeaderIgnoreNegative();
00310     test.testDiffColumnsIgnore();
00311     test.testDiffColumnsIgnoreNegative();
00312     test.testDiffDatasetIgnore();
00313     test.testDiffMapEpsilon();
00314     test.testDiffMapEpsilonNegative();
00315         test.testNaNNumDiffPositive();
00316         test.testNaNNumDiffNegative();
00317         test.testIgnoreNaNNumDifferences();
00318     Verbose::out (1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr (test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr (test.numFailed));
00319     return test.numFailed != 0;
00320   }
00321   catch(...) {
00322       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00323       return 1;
00324   }
00325   return 1;
00326 }
